original_title: WCW War Games: WCW's Most Notorious Matches
overview: WWE Hall of Famer Dusty Rhodes - the mind behind the mayhem - introduces some of the most famous War Games matches (featuring Ric Flair, Sting, the nWo, and more) and gives viewers a comprehensive look inside NWA/WCW s most innovative concept that revolutionized sports entertainment.
title: WCW War Games: WCW's Most Notorious Matches
